title: Enclave Luxury Condominium for Rent
posting_body: ['Live like royalty on beautiful grounds, at a convenient location.', '★\u3000Huge single level unit (2,200sqft) - no stairs to climb!', '★\u3000Sound-proofed concrete building - no noises from neighbors, no complaints!', '★\u30002 bedroom (one is huge)/2 bathroom', '★\u3000Modern kitchen, includes all appliances', '★\u3000Living room, dining room, sun room, home office area, washer/dryer in unit', '★\u3000Lawn & snow plow service, maintenance, water & trash service included', '★\u30005th floor penthouse unit overlooking a lake', '★\u3000Covered parking', '★\u3000Facility includes security gate, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness room, barbeque deck, conference room, mini-library', '★\u3000Well maintained, quiet grounds surrounded by nature', '★\u3000Partially furnished', '★\u3000Next to 12 Oaks Mall, 2 minutes to freeway ramp, many restaurants, bars, & grocery stores nearby', '★\u3000$2,450/month', 'Previously has been rented by companies for their overseas executives and other professionals.', 'Very private, secure, and quiet.', 'Most units are owner occupied.', 'Cats okay.', 'Please write for additional photos.']
